name: Unamed Metroidvania
description:
Controls:
W A S D to move and W to jump
Sword Attack with LMB
Shuriken Throw with RMB


V1-     2 Enemies (flying jelly and Patrolling goblin)
             1 Level
             Triple Jump
             Throwing Shuriken and Sword Attack

V2 - Parallax background and bug fixes
           (Shurikens work on both enemies now)
           Fixed Camera Margin problem.

Any Feedback Appreciated
